infoPlist.NSContactsUsageDescription: A Number For Us needs access to your contacts to display contact information. Otherwise, you'll just see the number.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: A Number For Us needs access to your camera to read the invitation.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: A Number For Us needs access to your camera to read invitation.
infoPlist.NSLocationUsageDescription: A Number For Us needs access to your location to find local phone numbers.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: A Number For Us needs access to your location to find local phone numbers.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: A Number For Us needs access to your location to find local phone numbers.
